name: Real Gangster Revenge: Downtown Gang War Car Mafia
name_original: Real Gangster Revenge: Downtown Gang War Car Mafia
description: Welcome to the Gangster Revenge Downtown Gang War! This amazing gangster game is a car race game. In this gangster revenge game, gangster will take revenge from people who betrayed him. He has just one aim to kill all his opponents with gangster strike action and become the Boss and rule on the entire city. Your mission is to catch all those double-crossers who betrayed you and take your gangster revenge. Drift the streets as a crook, search out your enemies one by one as you scramble with others to control the city. There can only be ONE BOSS in this gangster game and it has to be you!
